Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"",! Write "",! Write "
" Write "" Write "Пожалуйста, ждите..." Write "" Write "
",! Write ""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write "<title>"_($G(%session.Data("systemname"),"Пожалуйста подождите"))_"</title>",! Write "<Script language=""Javascript"">" Write !,"var w=window.width;",! Write "var h=window.height;",! Write "window.moveTo((screen.width-200)/2, (screen.height-200)/2);",! Write "var change=0",! Write "function blink(){",! Write "if (change==0)",! Write "text.style.fontWeight=700",! Write "else",! Write "text.style.fontWeight=100",! Write "change = (change==0) ? 100 : 0",! Write "}",! Write "setInterval(""blink()"",500)",! Write "</Script>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
